trans-unit.source: Provides access to the shared speech recognition service available on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: Gir tilgang til delte tale recognition tjenesten tilgjengelig på Windows-skrivebordet.

trans-unit.source: Applications use the shared recognizer to access Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: Programmer bruker delte gjenkjenner til å få tilgang til Windows Talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Use the SpeechRecognizer object to add to the Windows speech user experience.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SpeechRecognizer-objektet til å legge til Windows-tale-brukeropplevelsen.

trans-unit.source: This class provides control over various aspects of the speech recognition process: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir kontroll over forskjellige deler av tale recognition prosessen: – du kan administrere tale recognition grammars ved bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To get information about current speech recognition operations, subscribe to the SpeechRecognizer’s <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil ha informasjon om gjeldende tale recognition operasjoner, kan du abonnere på SpeechRecognizer <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>hendelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: - To view or modify the number of alternate results the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil vise eller endre hvor mange alternative resultater av gjenkjenner returnerer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren returnerer recognition resultater i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To access or monitor the state of the shared recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil få tilgang til eller overvåke tilstanden til den delte gjenkjenneren, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>Egenskaper og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>hendelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil synkronisere endringer i gjenkjenner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: Delt gjenkjenner bruker mer enn én tråd til å utføre oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the shared recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Som emulerer inndata delt gjenkjenner, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The configuration of Windows Speech Recognition is managed by the use of the **Speech Properties** dialog in the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjonen av Windows Talegjenkjenning administreres ved å bruke den **egenskaper for tale** dialogboksen i den **Kontrollpanel**.

trans-unit.source: This interface is used to select the default desktop speech recognition engine and language, the audio input device, and the sleep behavior of speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Dette grensesnittet brukes til å velge den standard stasjonær motoren for talegjenkjenning og språk, lyd inndata enheten og knapp-virkemåten for talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: If the configuration of Windows Speech Recognition is changed while the application is running, (for instance, if speech recognition is disabled or the input language is changed), the change affects all SpeechRecognizer objects.
trans-unit.target: Hvis konfigurasjonen av Windows Talegjenkjenning endres mens programmet kjører, (for eksempel hvis talegjenkjenning er deaktivert eller endres inndata språket), endringen påvirker alle SpeechRecognizer-objekter.

trans-unit.source: To create an in-process speech recognizer that is independent of Windows Speech Recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en kjørende tale gjenkjenner er uavhengig av Windows Talegjenkjenning, kan du bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A>før du slipper siste referanse til tale gjenkjenner.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamlingen kaller gjenkjenner objektets `Finalize` metoden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object maintains a separate set of speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objekt beholder en separat sett med tale recognition grammars.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Henter formatet for lyden som mottas tale kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: The audio input format for the speech recognizer, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input to the recognizer is not configured.
trans-unit.target: Inndata formatet for tale-gjenkjenner, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis inndataene gjenkjenneren ikke er konfigurert.

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Henter krypteringsnivået lyden som mottas tale kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Lyd nivået på inndataene tale-gjenkjenner, mellom 0 og 100.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the shared recognizer reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den delte gjenkjenneren rapporter krypteringsnivået lyd inndata.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren forårsaket hendelsen flere ganger per sekund.

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Hyppigheten av denne hendelsen oppstår som avhenger av datamaskinen programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: For å få lyd nivået da hendelsen, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å få gjeldende lyd nivå av inndataene gjenkjenneren, kan du bruke gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioLevelUpdated` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representanten for en `AudioLevelUpdated` hendelsen du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende plassering i lyd dataflyten som genereres av enheten som leverer inndata tale gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer receives input while the desktop speech recognition is running.
trans-unit.target: Delt gjenkjenner mottar inndata mens stasjonær Talegjenkjenning kjører.

trans-unit.source: The `AudioPosition` property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Den `AudioPosition` egenskapen refererer inndata enhetens posisjon i den genererte lyd dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position in processing audio input.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>egenskapen refererer til den gjenkjenner posisjonen i behandling inndata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Disse posisjonen kan være forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis gjenkjenneren har mottatt inndata har ikke der den ennå generert fører recognition og verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>egenskapen er mindre enn verdien for egenskapen AudioPosition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the speech recognizer's audio input stream through which it has received input.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i den tale gjenkjenner lyd inndataflyten som du har mottatt inndata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer encounters a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjenkjenneren oppstår et problem i lyd signalet.

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: For å få problemet som oppstod, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representanten for en `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` hendelsen du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for lyden som mottas tale kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Statusen for tale gjenkjenner lyd inndataene.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state changes in the audio being received by the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når tilstanden endringene i lydsnutten mottas kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilstanden lyd da hendelsen, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å få lyd statusen for inndataene gjenkjenneren, kan du bruke gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om lyd status, se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>opplisting.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioStateChanged` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representanten for en `AudioStateChanged` hendelsen du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Disposes den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Disposes den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objekt og versjoner ressurser som brukes i økten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frigi ressurser både administrerte og uforvaltede; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata av et uttrykk delt tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av i stedet for lyd for synkron talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen og tegn bredde når du bruker grammatikkregler på det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om denne typen sammenligning, se <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting verdier <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>og <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne også Ignorer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning resultatet for recognition-operasjon eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis operasjonen er ikke vellykket eller Windows Talegjenkjenning den **hvilemodus** tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata for bestemte ord delt tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av teksten i stedet for lyd for synkron talegjenkjenning, og angir hvordan gjenkjenneren håndterer Unicode sammenligningen mellom ordene og laste inn tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object using the information provided in the `wordUnits` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppretter en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objekt ved hjelp av informasjonen i den `wordUnits` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren bruker den `compareOptions` når det gjelder grammatikkregler for det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen hvis den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>verdien finnes.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne Ignorer alltid Tegnbredden, og Ignorer aldri Kana-type.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne også Ignorer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om Tegnbredden og Kana-type, se den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med ord enheter som inneholder de for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier opplisting som beskriver typen sammenligning skal brukes for Emulerte recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning resultatet for recognition-operasjon eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis operasjonen er ikke vellykket eller Windows Talegjenkjenning den **hvilemodus** tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata av et uttrykk delt tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av teksten i stedet for lyd for synkron talegjenkjenning, og angir hvordan gjenkjenneren håndterer Unicode sammenligningen mellom uttrykket og laste inn tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren bruker den `compareOptions` når det gjelder grammatikkregler for det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen hvis den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>verdien finnes.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne Ignorer alltid Tegnbredden, og Ignorer aldri Kana-type.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne også Ignorer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om Tegnbredden og Kana-type, se den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The input phrase for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Inndata-uttrykket for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier opplisting som beskriver typen sammenligning skal brukes for Emulerte recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning resultatet for recognition-operasjon eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis operasjonen er ikke vellykket eller Windows Talegjenkjenning den **hvilemodus** tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for asynchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata av et uttrykk delt tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av i stedet for lyd for asynkrone talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen og tegn bredde når du bruker grammatikkregler på det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om denne typen sammenligning, se <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting verdier <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>og <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne også Ignorer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for asynchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata for bestemte ord delt tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av teksten i stedet for lyd for asynkrone talegjenkjenning, og angir hvordan gjenkjenneren håndterer Unicode sammenligningen mellom ordene og laste inn tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object using the information provided in the `wordUnits` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppretter en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objekt ved hjelp av informasjonen i den `wordUnits` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren bruker den `compareOptions` når det gjelder grammatikkregler for det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen hvis den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>verdien finnes.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne Ignorer alltid Tegnbredden, og Ignorer aldri Kana-type.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne også Ignorer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om Tegnbredden og Kana-type, se den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med ord enheter som inneholder de for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier opplisting som beskriver typen sammenligning skal brukes for Emulerte recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for asynchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerer inndata av et uttrykk delt tale-gjenkjenner, ved hjelp av teksten i stedet for lyd for asynkrone talegjenkjenning, og angir hvordan gjenkjenneren håndterer Unicode sammenligningen mellom uttrykket og laste inn tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren bruker den `compareOptions` når det gjelder grammatikkregler for det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner som leveres med Vista og Windows 7 Ignorer bokstavtypen hvis den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>verdien finnes.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne Ignorer alltid Tegnbredden, og Ignorer aldri Kana-type.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjennerne også Ignorer nye linjer og ekstra mellomrom, og behandler tegnsetting som litteral.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om Tegnbredden og Kana-type, se den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>opplisting.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The input phrase for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Inndata-uttrykket for recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier opplisting som beskriver typen sammenligning skal brukes for Emulerte recognition-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the shared recognizer finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation for emulated input.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den delte gjenkjenneren fullfører en asynkron recognition-operasjon for Emulerte inndata.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metode som starter en asynkron recognition-operasjon.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner hever den `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` -hendelse når den fullfører den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous recognition operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron recognition operasjonen kan øke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>hendelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The EmulateRecognizeCompleted event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen EmulateRecognizeCompleted er sist slik at gjenkjenneren opphøyer for en gitt operasjonen hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representanten for en `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` hendelsen du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object is ready to process speech.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objektet er klar til å behandle tale.

trans-unit.source: Changes to this property do not affect other instances of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i denne egenskapen påvirker ikke andre forekomster av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>klassen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of the Enabled property is `true` for a newly instantiated instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen Enabled er som standard `true` for en nylig forekomstopprettet forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: While the recognizer is disabled, none of the recognizer's speech recognition grammars are available for recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren er deaktivert, men ingen av den gjenkjenner tale recognition grammars er tilgjengelige for recognition operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Setting the recognizer's Enabled property has no effect on the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av gjenkjenner aktivert egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object is performing speech recognition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objekt utfører talegjenkjenning; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that are loaded in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekter som lastes inn i dette <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This property does not return any speech recognition grammars loaded by another application.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer ikke en tale recognition grammars lastet inn av et annet program.

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that the application loaded into the current instance of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekter som programmet lastet inn i den gjeldende forekomsten av delt gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: Loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Delt gjenkjenner oppstår det et unntak hvis tale recognition grammatikk er allerede lastet inn, asynkront lastes eller kan ikke laste inn alle gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kjører gjenkjenneren, programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe motor for talegjenkjenning før innlasting av utlasting av, aktivering eller deaktivering av en grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn en tale recognition grammatikk asynkront, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: Tale recognition grammatikk ikke laste inn.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en tale recognition grammatikk asynkront.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer completes this asynchronous operation, it raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren fullfører denne asynkrone operasjonen, den opphøyer et <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner oppstår et unntak hvis tale recognition grammatikk er allerede lastet inn, asynkront lastes eller kan ikke laste inn alle gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kjører gjenkjenneren, programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe motor for talegjenkjenning før innlasting av utlasting av, aktivering eller deaktivering av en grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å laste inn en tale recognition grammatikk synkront, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: Tale recognition grammatikk ikke laste inn.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer finishes the asynchronous loading of a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjenkjenneren avsluttes asynkron innlasting av en tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metode som starter en asynkron operasjon.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `LoadGrammarCompleted` event when it completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner hever den `LoadGrammarCompleted` -hendelse når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that the recognizer loaded, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Å hente <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet som gjenkjenneren lastet inn, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To get the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects the recognizer has loaded, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å hente gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter i gjenkjenner har lastet inn, bruker du gjenkjenner <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a `LoadGrammarCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representanten for en `LoadGrammarCompleted` hendelsen du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the shared recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det maksimale antallet alternative resultater som delt gjenkjenner returnerer for hver recognition-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>klassen inneholder samlingen av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objekter som representerer andre candidate interpretations av inndataene.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for MaxAlternates is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for MaxAlternates er 10.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of alternate results that the speech recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall alternative resultater som tale gjenkjenner returnerer for hver recognition-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den delte gjenkjenneren stopper recognition operasjoner under behandling av en applikasjon en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true`, if within the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler your application needs to change the state of the speech recognition service or change the loaded or enabled speech recognition grammars before the speech recognition service processes more input.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til `true`, hvis i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelsesbehandlingen applikasjonen må endre status for tjenesten tale recognition eller endre lastet inn eller aktivert tale recognition grammars før tale recognition tjenesten behandler flere inndata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> property to `true` causes each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler in every application to block the Windows speech recognition service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innstillingen det <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>egenskapen `true` fører til at hver <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelsesbehandlingen i hver programmet til å blokkere tjenesten Windows tale recognition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: To synchronize the changes to the shared recognizer with your application state, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å synkronisere endringer i den delte gjenkjenneren med tilstanden programmet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When PauseRecognizerOnRecognition is `true`, during the execution of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> handler the speech recognition service pauses and buffers new audio input as it arrives.
trans-unit.target: Når PauseRecognizerOnRecognition er `true`, under kjøring av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>behandlingsprogrammet tale recognition tjenesten stopper og bufrer nye inndata som det mottas.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler exits, the speech recognition service resumes recognition and starts processing information from its input buffer.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hendelsesbehandlingen avslutter, Talegjenkjenning for fortsetter av recognition tjenesten og starter behandling informasjon fra inndatabufferen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable the speech recognition service, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere eller deaktivere tale recognition tjenesten, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the shared recognizer waits to process input while any application is handling the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"></xref> event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den delte gjenkjenneren venter ikke behandle inndata under behandling av alle applikasjoner i <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"> </xref> hendelsen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende plassering av gjenkjenner i lyd inndataene behandling.

trans-unit.source: The `RecognizerAudioPosition` property references the recognizer's position in processing its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Den `RecognizerAudioPosition` egenskapen refererer til den gjenkjenner posisjonen i behandling lyd inndata.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligning av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen refererer til den angitte enheten plassering i den genererte lyd-dataflyten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Disse posisjonen kan være forskjellig.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the RecognizerAudioPosition property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis gjenkjenneren har mottatt inndata har ikke der den ennå generert fører recognition og verdien for egenskapen RecognizerAudioPosition er mindre enn verdien for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til gjenkjenneren i lyd inndataene behandling.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon om delt tale gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: This property returns information about the speech recognizer in use by Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer informasjon om tale gjenkjenner i bruk av Windows Talegjenkjenning.

trans-unit.source: Information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om delt tale gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer pauses to synchronize recognition and other operations.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjenkjenneren stopper for å synkronisere recognition og andre operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> before modifying its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe en forekomst av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>før du kan endre den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel da den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>er satt på pause, du kan laste inn, fjerner du, aktivere og deaktivere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>forårsaket hendelsen når den er klar til å godta endringer.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a RecognizerUpdateReached event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representant for en hendelse for RecognizerUpdateReached, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som delt gjenkjenner stanse midlertidig og oppdatere statusen.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren genererer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>hendelsen i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>er `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å gi et brukertoken, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en forskyvning lyd posisjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som delt gjenkjenner stanse midlertidig og oppdatere statusen og gir et brukertoken for tilknyttede hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren genererer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>hendelsen i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>inneholder verdien for den `userToken` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en forskyvning lyd posisjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte informasjon som inneholder informasjon for operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Forespørsler som delt gjenkjenner pause oppdatere statusen og leverer en forskyvning og et brukertoken for tilknyttede hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> plus the value of the `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenneren ikke starte oppdateringsforespørsel gjenkjenner før gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>er lik gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>pluss verdien for den `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren genererer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>hendelsen i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>inneholder verdien for den `userToken` parameteren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte informasjon som inneholder informasjon for operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition*> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen fra gjeldende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition*>å utsette forespørselen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjenkjenneren oppdager inndata som den kan identifisere som tale.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event in response to input.
trans-unit.target: Delt gjenkjenner kan øke denne hendelsen som svar på inndataene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>objektet angir plassering i den inngående dataflyten der gjenkjenneren oppdaget tale.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon, kan du se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>Egenskaper og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechDetected event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representant for en hendelse for SpeechDetected, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjenkjenneren gjenkjennes ord som kan være en komponent i flere fullført uttrykk i en grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event when the input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: Delt gjenkjenner kan øke denne hendelsen når de er tvetydig.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for en tale recognition grammatikk som støtter gjenkjenning av enten "ny Vær Prøv" eller "ny spill", "ny Vær Prøv" er inndata utvetydig og "nytt spill" er tvetydig inndata.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechHypothesized event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representant for en hendelse for SpeechHypothesized, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that does not match any of the speech recognition grammars it has loaded.
trans-unit.target: Skjer når gjenkjenneren mottar inndata som ikke samsvarer med noen av tale recognition grammars det er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Delt gjenkjenner opphøyer denne hendelsen hvis det avgjør at inndataene ikke samsvarer med tilstrekkelige konfidensnivået noen av innlastet tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>inneholder den avviste <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Konfidensnivået terskelverdi for den delte gjenkjenneren administreres av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, er tilknyttet en brukerprofil og lagres i Windows-registret.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan ikke skrive endringene i registret for egenskaper av delt gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechRecognitionRejected event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representant for en hendelse for SpeechRecognitionRejected, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that matches one of its speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Skjer når gjenkjenneren mottar inndata som svarer til én av de tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `SpeechRecognized` event if it determines with sufficient confidence that input matches one of the loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenner hever den `SpeechRecognized` hendelse hvis den bestemmer tilstrekkelig trygt at inndataene samsvarer med én av innlastet og aktivert tale recognition grammars.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>inneholder den aksepterte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Konfidensnivået terskelverdi for den delte gjenkjenneren administreres av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, er tilknyttet en brukerprofil og lagres i Windows-registret.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan ikke skrive endringene i registret for egenskaper av delt gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Når gjenkjenneren mottar inndata som samsvarer med en grammatikk den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>kan øke objektet i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektets <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>hendelsen starter før den tale gjenkjenner SpeechRecognized hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechRecognized event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representant for en hendelse for SpeechRecognized, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
