trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates whether the shared recognizer resident in Windows is in the `Stopped` or the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: Denne skrivebeskyttede egenskapen angir om den delte gjenkjenneren fast i Windows er i den `Stopped` eller `Listening` tilstand.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>opplisting.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SpeechRecognizer" name="SpeechRecognizer" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Status for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_SpeechRecognizer" name="SpeechRecognizer" href=""> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the running state of the Windows Desktop Speech Technology recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den kjørende tilstanden til Windows-skrivebordet tale teknologi recognition motoren endres.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event when the state of Windows Speech Recognition changes to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> state.
trans-unit.target: Delt gjenkjenner forårsaket hendelsen når tilstanden til Windows Talegjenkjenning endres til den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>tilstand.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: To get the state of the shared recognizer at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente tilstanden for delte gjenkjenner da hendelsen, bruker du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the shared recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For den gjeldende tilstanden til den delte gjenkjenneren, bruker du gjenkjenneren <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a StateChanged event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en representant for en hendelse for StateChanged, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [hendelser og representanter](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Unloads all speech recognition grammars from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle tale recognition grammars fra delt gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a grammar asynchronously, this method waits until the grammar is loaded, before it unloads all of the recognizer's grammars.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjenkjenneren for øyeblikket laster inn en grammatikk asynkront, venter denne metoden til grammatikk er lastet inn, før den fjernes alle den gjenkjenner grammars.

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne en bestemt grammatikk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified speech recognition grammar from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Laster ut en angitt tale recognition grammatikk fra delt gjenkjenner.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kjører gjenkjenneren, programmer må bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>Hvis du vil stoppe motor for talegjenkjenning før innlasting av utlasting av, aktivering eller deaktivering av en grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne alle grammars, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>

trans-unit.source: The grammar to unload.
trans-unit.target: Grammatikk å laste.
